1.title: Hard to Think
1.lyrics:
You are gone now, shadows fill the room
This hollow place where light once bloomed
The ache starts low, a quiet swell
A tide that rises, a silent knell
My time of joy has slipped away
I sit and wait for light of day
Hoping for a glimpse, a stolen glance
Caught between two worlds in trance
Hard to think, when love’s entwined
You hold my heart, yet you're not mine
Lost completely in your smile’s grace
A bittersweet, unyielding embrace
I have fallen hardest of all
In your absence, I feel small
Your words a melody in the dark
They echo deep inside my heart
Your concerns become my own
Through suffering I have grown
To make you mine, to keep you near
To shield your soul, to calm your fear
Loving is all that truly matters now
Fragile hearts tied by an unspoken vow
In this quiet space where longing survives
I keep your love alive in my mind’s eye
Hard to think, but harder still
To let go when love clings with iron will
Bound together by threads unseen
In love’s delicate, enduring dream
